options.content: ### Version of Different colours 游릴游릳游릱 are different versions. Move a cursor 游녡to the head of the line to get version info.

panels.title: 游빑 CPU % (游린 current vs 游릱 prev)

targets.expr:
100 * (
  (  sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:])) )
  -
  (  sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset})) )
)
/
( sum(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset})) )
